title: Empire Total War Unpacker (Extractor)
description:
##This is a simple Python script written by Alpaca.##
	##(modded for non-demo E:TW by Alexander Marsella aka:Vitcch)##

**Uploaded to ETWH WITH PERMISSION from Alpaca.**

ABOUT:
     This program will unpack(extract) the .pack files that Creative Assembly put all of their data files into to conserve space....you cannot do any modding unless you have access to these files.  This is what this program does.

Place the emp_unpacker.py Python script, place_holder.pack and the appropriate 
unpack_*.bat files into your:

\Steam\steamapps\common\empire total war\data (Win XP)

MAKE A BACKUP COPY OF THE .PACK FILES JUST IN CASE!!!

IMPORTANT NOTE!: You MUST install the Python 3.0.1 framework BEFORE you use this! 
(I've included the .msi installer so you don't have to download it seperately)

Once that's out of the way, simply find the appropriate unpack_*.bat file you just installed and 
double click on it, it will then extract the said pack files into their own personal directories.

Thank you and Enjoy!!

** unpack_Media will unpack sounds_music, movies, sounds_campaign, sounds_other and sounds_sfx **
** unpack_All will unpack everything(VERY BIG FILEs) **
